vsParam: Oh, that stuff you got is really cool!

What stuff? Ah! You reminded me,
Bergamot Sensei put something in our bag.

It's a [c][DF1FB2FF]Healing Salve[-][/c], a [c][009C8CFF]Recovery Item[-][/c],
and a [c][DF1FB2FF]Puni Ball[-][/c], an [c][009C8CFF]Attack Item[-][/c].

You need to [c][DF1FB2FF]equip the Combat Items in advance[-][/c] before battle.
Now open the "Party" interface first.
